name: Cogene Ventures
overview: Cogene Ventures is a venture capital firm specializing in seed capital, early stage, mid stage, expansion stage, growth, and late stage investments. The firm invests in life science and health care sectors with a focus on biopharmaceuticals, biotechnology platforms, therapeutic and diagnostic medical devices, medical products, health care information technology, and bionanotechnology. It also invests in cancer, neurological and behavioral disorders, and metabolic diseases of obesity and diabetes sector. The firm prefers to invest in the companies based in Southeastern United States with a focus on Houston, Texas. It typically invests between $200,000 and $10 million in its portfolio companies. The firm was formerly known as Cogene Biotech Ventures. It is a SBIC. Cogene Ventures was founded in June 2000 and is based in Houston, Texas.

funding_round.source_description: RAVEN BIOTECHNOLOGIES INC. RAISES $48.3 MILLION IN SERIES D FINANCING
